steps: Combine red lentils, water, turmeric, and salt in a pot
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes until lentils break down into a creamy consistency, stirring occasionally
While lentils cook, prepare the tempering: heat ghee in a small pan over medium heat
Add cumin and mustard seeds, cook until they start to pop (30 seconds)
Add onion and cook until softened and golden (5-7 minutes)
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute
Add coriander, garam masala, and chili powder, cook for 30 seconds
Pour the tempering mixture into the cooked lentils and stir to combine
Serve garnished with cilantro and lime wedges, alongside rice or naan
title: Red Lentil Dahl
